Key Match Events: Bulgaria scored the opening goal in the 40th minute after Bailey Peacock-Farrell's error
Northern Ireland struggled to create chances and couldn't equalize
Pre-Game Insights: Northern Ireland came into the match on a strong run of form with a win over Luxembourg
The match was played on a difficult pitch with stifling heat
Post-Match Reflections: Michael O'Neill expressed disappointment with the result despite Northern Ireland's improved second-half performance
The result leaves Northern Ireland third in Group C3 after two matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The attendance at Stadion Hristo Botev was 14,300
Northern Ireland will face Belarus on 12 October and Bulgaria will host them in Belfast three days later
